Judul: TECHNICAL ANALYSIS OF NARROW GOLD VEIN UNDERGROUND MINING, A CASE STUDY IN PT ANTAM TBK UBPE PONGKOR
Abstrak:
PT Antam Tbk UBPE Pongkor has discovered narrow gold vein in its mining area. This narrow vein cannot be
mined by using mechanized cut and fill mining method. Other methods which are resuing or shrinkage stoping
underground mining method will be developed to mine these narrow veins. Technical design parameters for
each proposed mining method were calculated based on the field data. It consists of opening width, blasting
pattern, supporting system, productivity, and break even cut of grade. Each method has its own advantages and
disadvantages based on the technical analysis. As result, resuing method will produce cleaner ore and higher
COG, however, need more support materials and explosives.
Kontributor / Dosen Pembimbing: Firly R. Baskoro, Tri Karian, Anzhari Wadiyan, Eko Sunarso, M. Rahman Ardhiansyah, Aryo P. Wibowo
Kata Kunci: mining method, narrow gold vein, resuing method, shrinkage stoping
